channel.title: activeDirectory on Braindump
channel.description: Recent content in activeDirectory on Braindump

item.title: PowerShell - Get Domain Controllers in Forest
item.description: To list all of the domain controllers in an Active Directory forest: (Get-ADForest).Domains | %{ Get-ADDomainController -Filter * -Server $_ }| Format-Table -Property Name,ComputerObjectDN,Domain,Forest,IPv4Address,OperatingSystem,OperatingSystemVersion
